document_data.caption: From left to right: a [[deathjump spider]], a [[blade spider]], a demonweb terror, and a swarm of [[bloodweb spider]]s
document_data.name: Demonweb Terror
document_data.mainbody: '''Demonweb terrors''' were a species of monstrously sized [[spider]] native to the [[Demonweb Pits]] of [[Lolth]].
document_data.Abilities: These creatures had a [[poison]]ous bite, but could also spray their venom at prey.
document_data.Combat: Demonweb terrors would use their webs to immobilize prey as they moved around and made bite attacks. Once a victim was slain, they were not above retreating with the corpse to feast upon it.

Society.Homelands: Though native to the Demonweb Pits, over time these creatures managed to find their way into the [[Elemental Chaos]] and the [[Prime Material plane]].
Society.Languages: These creatures were capable of speaking [[Abyssal language|Abyssal]].
Society.Relationships: These creatures were sometimes seen in the company of [[drider]]s.
